# costory Provider

The Costory provider forwards API calls to the Costory app.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "costory" {
  token = var.costory_token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `token` (String, Sensitive) Costory API token.

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) Costory API base URL
